raw_body:
FERNANDO – DOUGLAS FRANCIS (ex. Bank of Ceylon). At Rest with Jesus. Dearly beloved son of late Oswald and Florence,​ husband of late Noreen,​ father of Adrian,​ Andrea and Douglas,​ father-in-law of Karen,​ Rohan and Niroshini,​ grandfather of Damian,​ Natalia,​ Romeali,​ Amelia,​ Shaheali & Sophia,​ brother of late Anton,​ Roy,​ Hyacinth,​ Eunice,​ Ronald,​ Dorathy and Rita,​ Sheila,​ Felix,​ Winifred,​ Audry and Noel. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 26th January 2024. Service on 27th January at 3.30 p.m. followed by burial at Roman Catholic Section,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella.
005720
